description: CastOn casts media contents stored in, or web pages found by your mobile device onto a TV. CastOn also casts contents from 3rd party apps to TV. It is by far the most versatile UPNP player on the market. This is a free version that is ad-supported. This version does not allow sharing contents via the share link from 3rd party apps even though you may still call CastOn as a regular player. You can get the premium version CastOn TV Premium to have the restriction removed. CastOn requires a Wifi network and a UPNP/DLNA compatible TV or set-top box. Many types of TV and set-top boxes are supported, including some DLNA models from Sony, Samsung, etc. If the TV or set-top box is not UPNP/DLNA capable, consider upgrading with CastOn TV Receiver , or using the HDMI Dongle at www.web2mytv.com. Using CastOn is really easy - select the TV screen to play on, then select the content to play. There are more sophisticated short-cuts as you will discover, but the simplest way is always there and it works. Soon you will find out that you can control the sound volume of the TV with the volume button on your handset; you can move to the next or previous clip by swiping left and right on the preview pane; and similarly, you can switch between remote and local screens by swiping up and down on the preview pane. If you are even more adventurous, get the CastOn TV Receiver on your Android set-top box to experience using your phone as a Wifi remote with keyboard, and use playlist, bookmarks, and live web pages on TV! As a UPNP/DLNA-compatible player, CastOn can cast most audio, video, and photo formats onto TV using a common home Wifi network. But that is not all - CastOn's capability goes far beyond these DLNA "basics" if it is paired with CastOn TV Receiver, a set-top box app that is also available on Google Play. With the matching receiver, you will discover the following additional features: 1. Cast web pages. Send your favorite web pages to the TV screen and play it using your handset. What does it mean - any content, anywhere. It works whether your are doing a weekly report in web format or watching online videos embedded in a web page. 2. Create a playlist for video and audio. Prepare your own "program" before you sit down and watch. There's no need to play the clips one by one. You will still be able to insert a clip to play immediately, and in that case the playlist will resume after the clip is done. 3. Monitor and control the TV without a full-time connection The CastOn console will display current progress of your TV, and allow you to fast-forward, rewind, pause, cancel, and go to the next or previous program with the simple touch of a button. More importantly, you can still use your mobile device for other activities. You can leave the application to check your email, for example, and CastOn will still be on when you go back to it. Feedback and comments are always welcomed! Contact us at support@web2mytv.com if you need to speak to us.
release_text: 1, Feature enhancements for the new 2.x CastOn TV Receiver. 2. 1.x compatible 3, Bug fixes to improve stability

app_name: ジュニアサッカー時計 サンプル版
description: LiveWare extension for SmartWatch 2 Smart Connect extension for Control API Smart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2 ジュニアサッカー審判用の時計アプリのサンプル版です。 4級審判の方などにお勧めです。 自分はこのアプリのために SmartWatch 2 （SW2） を購入しました。 市販のレフリーウォッチと比べるば格安です。 ゲームタイムとランニングタイムの計測、タイムアップ時のバイブレーション、得点のメモなどができます。 サンプル版では設定画面が開きません。 （設定画面では試合時間とチームの登録ができます。 チームはチーム名とチームカラーで構成されます。 チームをロングタップするとドラッグ＆ドロップで順番の入れ替えができます。 一番下にドロップするとチームの削除ができます。ただし、2チーム以下にはできません。 一番下をタップするとチームの追加ができます。） ■準備 対戦するチームをタップで選択します。 6チーム以上ある場合は上下スワイプで切り替わります。 画面上部をタップするとキックオフのサイドが変わります。 本部席に向かって両サイドを決めると良いでしょう。 オプションキーで前半へ進みます。 ■前半 時計部分をタップしてスタートします。 以後時計部分をタップするとランニングタイムが停止・再開します。 画面上部の左右をタップすることで双方のチームに得点が入ります。 バックキーで取り消すことができます。 ゲームタイムが試合時間に達すると時計が振動します。 オプションキーで時計が止まります。 更にオプションキーで休憩（ハーフタイム）へ進みます。 サンプル版では休憩を飛ばして後半へ進みます。 （■休憩（ハーフタイム） 後半に備えて左右のチームが入れ替わります。 休憩中は経過時間の表示のみとなります。 オプションキーで後半へ進みます。） ■後半 操作は前半と同じです。 引き分けの場合、オプションキーでP.K.へ進みます。 ■P.K. 画面下部タップで先攻後攻を設定します。 画面上部の左右をタップすることで結果が入ります。 攻撃側のタップで成功、守備側のタップで失敗となります。 バックキーで取り消すことができます。 人数制限は無いので適当なところで終了としてください。 ■レジューム機能について サンプル版にレジューム機能はありません。 （激しく動いていると接続が切れてしまうことがあったので、本機能を追加しました。 前後半や休憩中（タイマー動作中）に接続が切れた場合、次回起動時に状態を復元します。 その際、アプリ停止中の経過時間も加算されます。 バックキーで戻れるのはレジューム時の状態までとなります。） 【注意】 レジューム機能によりリスクは減りましたが、公式戦等では念のため他の時計とセットで使用する事をお勧めします。 LiveWare extension for SmartWatch 2 Smart Connect extension for Control API Smart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2 This is a sample version of the clock app of junior football umpire. It is recommended to such person of the quaternary referee. Myself I purchased the SmartWatch 2 (SW2) for this app. It is cheap if compared to the referee watch on the market. Measurement of the running time and game time, vibration of the time up, and notes to score you can. Setting screen does not open the sample version. You can register the team and game time is (setting screen. The team is composed of team colors and team name. You can order replacement of a drag-and-drop when you long tap the team. You can delete your team if you drop to the bottom. However, it can not be a 2 team below. You can add the team when you tap the bottom. ) ■ Preparing I want tap the team to play against. To switch up and down swipe If there is 6 or more teams. Side of the kick-off will change when you tap the top of the screen. You may want to decide both sides toward the headquarters seat. I go to the first half in the option key. ■ first half You start by tapping the clock part. Running time will stop and resume when you tap the clock part thereafter. Points will enter the team both by tapping the left and right of the top of the screen. You can cancel the back key. Watch vibrates game time reaches the game time. Clock will stop in the option key. I go to (half-time) break option key again. Proceed to the second half by skipping a break in the sample version. (■ Break (half-time) Team of left and right are swapped in preparation for the second half. It becomes only the display of elapsed time during breaks. I go to the second half in the option key. ) ■ second half Operation is the same as the first half. In the case of a draw, I go to PK in the option key. ■ P.K. I set who plays in the bottom of the screen tap. Results to enter by tapping the left and right of the top of the screen. Success in the tap of attacking, you will fail in the tap of the defensive side. You can cancel the back key. Please be terminated where appropriate since there is no number limit. ■ About the resume function There is no resume function to sample version. Since there was able to connection drops and is moving violently (and added this function. If the connection is lost to (timer running) break before and during the second half, and then restore the state at the next startup. At that time, the elapsed time of the application is stopped is also added. Get it back in the back key it will be up to state of resuming. ) [Note] Risk has been reduced by the resume function, but it is recommended that you use in combination with other watches just in case in the official game, etc..

An intellectual, educational and addictive game that helps develop abstract thinking. It will help you rest and improve your knowledge of foreign language. It is a follow-up to our “Learn and Play” app. The difference is in new words: nouns and adjectives. The app is made in the format of a quiz (puzzle) that allows to guess words through similar attributes as well as to learn such languages as English, French, German, Italian, Russian, Spanish, Polish, Ukrainian and Portuguese. 1) guess the encrypted word and type the write answer that corresponds to the images shown (compare and analyze the images); 2) for better understanding of the tasks, the part of speech and the number of letters are shown; 3) those who have trouble guessing the word get three hints (First letter; Second letter; Whole word); 4) if you type in the right answer, you see the translation of the word in one of the chosen languages; 5) when using hints, the bonus for the reply is decreased by 10 points. This logical game helps develop the creative potential. It is very interesting, but you need to be sharp to solve the word riddles. The answer always lies in the associative link with the pictures. The app is useful for children and adults. It helps improve concentration, memory and imagination. If you want to test your skills, start a competition in the company of your friends. Simple interface, HD tablet support and graphic themed photos allow to concentrate on guessing words as well as learning and training foreign languages. Those learning a foreign language will be able to easily remember words, study them and improve their vocabulary. The game also allows to learn correct pronunciation and spelling through visual and audio support. With this entertaining application you will always have fun developing your creativity and cognitive abilities and you will never be bored! This is a free version of the app; you can download the paid version with voice work by a native speaker.

description: Resurrection of arcade’s masterpiece game!! ★★★ Greece, Spain, Mexico, Argentina, Chile ranked # 1 action game! ★★★ South Korea ranked # 3 overall game! * Note: The ability to jump below and find the treasure box features Snow Bros. 2 is a feature. Many thanks to the love and attention will try to create Snow Bros. 2. Snow Bros, the game that was sensationally popular in the 90s is back. With many loves from worldwide gamers, Snow Bros has become a remake and been launched. Optimized into the Smartphone environment, anyone can easily enjoy and play. You play out the game more than 50 stages by defeating about 20 kinds of monsters. Also you can compete with other players in leaderboards and achievements through acquiring items, clearing stages, and raising the all-kill points. Now! Let’s create the snowballs, defeat the monsters, and save the princess! If you delay, the pumpkin ghost will appear and harass you. So be careful! Game mode -One Coin Mode: (Lite ver.)The mode that has to be cleared by only one coin. You can feel the nostalgic thrilling like in the arcade. Notice - Support Android above 2.3 - The data used on different platform (Normal cell phone, Omnia, Iphone) does not work with the game. - If USIM/phone number/operator/person is changed, the game and data are impossible to activate. - Error, bug related inquiries contact: info@isac.co.kr - Unsupported device: X10mini / HTC wildfire / MB501, etc. - The equipment and the performance of similar devices, the game may not work smoothly.

★★★★★ PaperChibi is an amazing new application for personalized avatar paper crafts. Check out our video to see how it works: http://paperchibi.com/video Make cute chibi avatars; change their clothes, hairstyle, eyes, and lots more. Then print and make real 3D papercraft avatars. Create chibi friends and family. Make a t-rex or a car for your chibi to ride in. To assemble: use an adhesive dot roller, scrapbooking glue dots, a glue stick, or small strips of double sided tape. Works best with photo paper or card stock. Set your printer to use 8.5"x11" or A4 paper. Email a PDF to yourself to print from your desktop computer or laptop. You can try installing and printing on your device with a printer app from Google Play, but often the least frustrating way to print is to email or copy the file to a desktop or laptop and print from there. Chibi avatars are completely customizable! There are several print options that vary in poses and difficulty. The simplest chibi is very kid friendly. Incredibly fun for school art classes. Teachers, consider adding them to storytelling projects! Take a photo of the chibi avatars you've made and share them on Instagram or Twitter with hash tag #paperchibi.

Think you got an app idea that’s sure to a splash? Pitch your idea for a chance to have it developed and become the next elite member of the Incubation Nation. •••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••• The App Incubator Featured on: • BBC, CNN & CNBC • Fast Company, Advertising Age & The Guardian • Mashable, Read Write Web & IT News Wire • Trendslate, Crazy Mike’s Apps & The Coventry Telegraph Incubator apps featured on: • NBC, CNBC, MSNBC, CNN, CBS, BBC, ABC & FOX • Forbes, Fast Company, Advertising Age & FOX Business • Esquire, Glamour, Oprah, Marie Claire & The UK Sun • New York Times, LA Times, Washington Post, OC Register & SF Gate • Cnet, Mashable, Crazy Mike’s Apps, 148Apps & BBC Click • The Kevin & Bean show on 106.7KROQ! And hundreds more! To peruse all the News for Incubation Nation, go to www.medlmobile.com/press. •••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••• The App Incubator is the original iPhone app that gives anybody with a great app idea a shot at getting it made. If your app idea can deliver the goods, the App Incubator will cover the rest and give you a handsome share of the profits. ----------------------------------------- FROM CONCEPT TO CREATION Using the simple & straightforward interface, the App Incubator will walk you through every step of the submission process. This makes it easy to flesh out the details so you can transform any rough idea into a refined model. It’s quick, effortless and most importantly, safe. Once your idea is submitted into the Incubator, the next step is for us to review it. Please understand that we receive thousands of submissions every week, so it could take us some time before we can review your idea. If we feel the idea has potential—and it meets our app quality standards—we will design, develop and market it, and share the profits of every download with you. Best of all, you don’t pay a single cent. Pretty sweet, eh? THE PROCESS INVOLVED To submit your idea, briefly describe the app and its target audience. After that, you can choose to describe your app according to five factors: originality, functionality, simplicity, profit potential and fun. Filling this out will help us make our decision, so try to be as thorough as you can. You can also submit your ideas via our website. We offer a free downloadable storyboard template to help visualize your idea. Don’t worry if drawing isn’t your strength—we just want to get an idea of how you see the app working :-) Your submissions are editable, so making a change to your idea or adding something new is easy. If you decide to withdraw your submission, and we have not already begun to build it, send us an e-mail and we will be happy to do so. ----------------------------------------- NO STRINGS ATTACHED • You do not have to pay any money to submit your ideas. • You do not have to pay for any design, development or marketing. • We run updates & maintenance free of charge. • We handle Apple relations for you. • If you would like to remove your idea from the Incubator, just send us an e-mail requesting the rights back. • As long as your app is on the App Store, and sales have passed the break-even point, you get 25% of every download. * __________________________________________________________________________- _______________________ *Certain restrictions apply. See Terms & Conditions for full details. We are proud to call the App Incubator a Shiny MEDL Object. You can see all of them at www.medlmobile.com. And if you have an idea for an app that you’d like to see on the App Store someday, visit www.appincubator.com.

description: Express your style with the calculator made just for you. Choose a colorful, stylish theme to brighten your day while you calculate with ease. CALCU™ is a breeze to use for everyday calculations, with all the scientific capability you need for work and school just a swipe away. And for your most demanding needs, CALCU™ allows you to add or remove the functions and constants you need to make the perfect calculator designed by you, for you. The Droid Lawyer rates CALCU™ 4.5 out of 5, calling it “a great replacement for Android’s stock calculator”... and we couldn’t agree more! CALCU™ offers all the regular and scientific calculator functions in a simple, stylish and easy-to-use app. Download it for free today! Features ★ Beautiful and intuitive interface with gesture based control and navigation ★ See instant results of your calculations as you enter them ★ Swipe up on the keypad to reveal scientific keypad ★ Swipe down on the display to see calculation history ★ Swipe up on the scientific keypad to customize it ★ Create user-defined constants for frequently needed values ★ Choose between simple and full keypad layout ★ Choose from a range of stylish themes

description: Timmy's Themes & Wallpapers helps you personalize your phone with thousands of wallpapers and themes! We add new themes and new wallpapers daily, so you will always have fresh personalization options! 1. LARGEST THEMES & WALLPAPER COLLECTION: Timmy's Themes & Wallpapers has the largest collection of personalization apps available on the market, organized in easy to use categories: THEMES: thousands of themes for your Launchers, Keyboards, Contacts, SMS, Lockscreens and many other apps! WALLPAPERS & LIVE WALLPAPERS: thousands of static or animated wallpapers available in hundreds of styles! OTHER PERSONALIZATION APPS: Clock widgets, Calendar widgets, Fonts, Emoticons and much more! You'll never need another App Discovery Tool for your personalization! 2. INNOVATIVE SEARCH TECHNOLOGY: With an innovative search technology, Timmy's Themes & Wallpapers is the first app ever which allows you to browse through dozens of filters in real time, helping you find the perfect theme or wallpaper for your phone! All our themes and wallpapers are categorised by a multitude of filters! You can narrow-down your searches by selecting: - STYLE, use this to quickly select different styles such as Cartoon, Nature, Realistic, Texture, Christmas, Flat, Scary, Tech/Futuristic and dozens more! - COLOR, all our wallpapers and themes are tagged by color, so you can quickly select from Pink, Red, Blue, Multicolor and many, many more! - PRICE, only find the apps you can afford or exclusively search for FREE ones! - REQUIRED APPS: some themes need specific Launchers or other custom apps to be applied. We've made it easy for you, if you are already using one of these custom apps, to search only for the themes which can work with your desired app! We've got all the custom Launchers, custom keyboards, lockscreens, SMS apps and so on! You can select as many filters as you like and you will instantly see how many applications are available for that exact combination of filters! 3. DETAILED PRESENTATION FOR EACH THEME OR WALLPAPER: After you've found an app you like, you can check out all its screenshots, ratings or comments without ever leaving the app, thanks to an in-depth presentation page for each of our listed personalization apps. For themes, you can immediately see what custom apps, if any, they require in order to be applied to your phone! If a launcher theme or an icon pack can be applied to multiple launchers, we will let you know and give you the links to download those apps, to make it easy to use that particular theme! Remember, you can always use the filters to narrow down your theme search to only the Launcher or the Keyboard you are currently using! Timmy's Themes and Wallpapers is the ultimate personalization tool! We've built it out of our love for phone customization and mobile design! DOWNLOAD NOW and transform your phone! If you like Timmy's Themes & Wallpapers, help us grow by rating and commenting. We are very eager to hear your thoughts! You can also send us an email at: management@timmystudios.com

description: YOU CAN DO IT ON A PLANE! There is a paid version Flight Map, that includes database of world airports, estimated time of arrival and recording of the route flown that can be shared on social networks, so after you have tried the Flight Map FREE, you might consider upgrading. Or, you might consider upgrading to Flight Map HD, which has much more detailed map of the world. Flight Map FREE is a unique application that works as your own personal flight tracker (Sky map) while flying in an airplane. It shows where you currently are, speed, altitude and some other information about your flight. You can also see and name the landmarks on the way, so that you know what you see from your window. Flight Map FREE also displays visible and used GPS / GLONASS satellites, so you can use it as a GPS testing tool. The GPS function works when your phone is in airplane mode, because it does not broadcast any radio, it rather listens to the GPS satellites only. Features include: - Real time position of the plane on the map - Zoomable world map not dependent on a connection to internet - Your own personal flight tracker - Works when your phone is in Airplane mode, so it can be used anytime while in flight - Dark / Light skin - Metric / Imperial units - Multilanguage (currently English, Spanish, Portugese, French, Russian, Chinese, Vietnamese, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Hungarian) - Map can be fullscreen or split screen with real time flight data - GPS / GLONASS Satellites real time display depending on your device capabilities - Sunrise and sunset at present position Please note that Flight Map FREE is heavily dependent on the quality of your device's GPS capabilities. If your device is capable of A-GPS (Assisted GPS), please run the application while on the ground, so that the satellites' positions get downloaded from the internet, it will be much easier for the device to pick up signal when in the air. Please share your experience with various devices. Most of the time Flight Map FREE works perfectly when sitting in a window seat and does not work too good when sitting two seats from the window or more. In any case we recommend to move the device to the window, let it pick up the satellites signal first and then try how far from the window it can pick up the signal. The screen showing the visible and used satellites is designed to help you with this. If your device is capable of receiving GLONASS signal, the satellites are shown with a differently colored border. If you want to translate Flight Map FREE into your language (or correct our translation), please contact the developer. The first run of the application takes a while because it needs to unpack the whole world map to be able to display it. Polish translation thanks to Tomasz Pryca Hungarian translation thanks to Dr. Istvan Lunczer

description: 3D Live Wallpaper

How fast can you throw? How fast can you run? With S.I.A.L. Studios' Pitch Speed, you can find the speed of any moving object such as a baseball, football, tennis ball, vehicle, etc... like a radar gun! The results will be shown in Feet per second (fps) and Miles per hour (MPH). This is an easy tool for anyone who wants to find out how fast they throw, or how fast they run. It can even be used to check the speeds of professional players on TV, if you ever feel that the announcers are lying to you. All you have to do is tap and hold the screen when the object starts moving (like when the player releases the ball, or starts running), and then release it after the catcher catches it, or the runner crosses the finish line. (just remember to set the distance)

Seasons Live Wallpaper is a new style 3D live wallpaper which uniquely delivers and captures the beauty of wild and rugged mountain peaks along with sakura trees. As you relax the trees sway and the sakura leaves drop, swirl and dance in the wind against a stunning background of cloud-topped mountain peaks, lanterns, valleys and beautiful Bamboo house. Seasons Live Wallpaper is 3D rendered in OpenGL 2.0, and is fully interactive. Panning left and right then delivers unique 3D angles on the distant mountains, clouds, lanterns, valleys and sakura trees; these unique angles allow you to view things in 3D as if you were a bird sweeping through the treetops or a person swinging from a tree. It allows you to immerse yourself fully in the mountain scenery and appreciate the wild beauty of nature. Many things in Seasons Live Wallpaper can be customized to suit your mood. Among them are: Panning - Decide if want the camera angle to change when you swipe left and right to get 3D view Petal number - Choose the number of falling sakura leaves you want Petal speed - Choose the speed at which you want the sakura leaves to fall Full Features: Seasons - our Seasons could be customized as user as Spring, Summer, Autumn and Winter. Rain - isable / Enable rain in Spring, Summer and Autumn. Environment Light - Disable/Enable the environment light as morning, afternoon and dusk base on the real time. Other Info Seasons Live Wallpaper is best suitable for both tablets and smartphones and is designed for portrait and landscape modes. It only uses battery when the screen is on. Once the screen is turned off Seasons Live Wallpaper stops consuming power. IMPORTANT. It's a LIVE WALLPAPER and therefore can't be applied to your device by tapping the application icon. To use Seasons Live Wallpaper, go to the live wallpaper menu of your phone. Usually this is found by returning to Home, tapping Menu and then choosing Wallpapers. This live wallpaper has been tested on the latest Android system(5.1.x Lollipop). Please contact us if it doesn't work on your device. Note: If your wallpaper resets to default after reboot, you will need put the app on phone instead of SD card.

description: Cool Bubble Level (Clinometer) - Angle & slope measure tool for Android. Hold your phone against an object to test it for level or plumb, or lay it face-up on a flat object for a surface level. Try out our Smart Tools that is always at hand. - - Full HD (1920x1080) and WQHD (2560x1440) screens support without loss of quality - Easy and quick calibration function - Show angle or inclination - Level or plumb angle measurements - Surface level meter - Units of measurement: 2 types of degrees and roof pitch :12 - Lock angle meter button - Sound on bubble centered position for easier control - X and Y axis switch mode (for some devices) - Easy to use smart level tool - Install on SD - Wiki - An inclinometer or clinometer is an instrument for measuring angles of slope (or tilt). We will try to make the best bubble level free app for Android devices. Bubble Level app tries to mimic the real bull's eye level and displays the data as real bull's eye level meter would. If you'll get an error, please don't leave bad comment right away. Leave us a chance to fix it, send the error report and your comments. We are trying hard to make it work on every device. With questions or suggestions please contact us: support@kidsgamesgalaxy.com
release_text: Added full support for WQHD (2560x1440) and WQXGA (2560x1600) screens. Some issues with device screen orientation are fixed. "Keep screen on" problem on some devices is fixed.

Каждый раз, составляя список покупок, мы пишем одно и то же, а затем этот список выбрасываем. И не важно, делаем мы это на бумаге или в приложении: вместе со списком мы выбрасываем знания. ini помогает повторно использовать списки покупок, сохранить время и силы. Не создавайте список каждый раз. Создайте один раз и используйте снова и снова списки: - для дома и офиса; - для важных событий; - для приготовления любимых блюд. Единый список покупок. Отметьте в списках всё, чего не хватает. В магазине ini покажет единым списком всё, что нужно купить. Не указывайте цену. Цены растут ежемесячно и разнятся от магазина к магазину. Однажды вбитые в приложение, они «обязывают» себя обновлять. Это не облегчает жизнь, а нагружает дополнительными обязательствами. Поэтому в ini нет цен. Готовые списки. Мы посоветовались с экспертами в области ведения домашнего хозяйства и составили базовые списки покупок. Подстройте их под себя - составьте на их основе собственные, уникальные. Пользуйтесь ini легко и с удовольствием. Each time, making a shopping list, we write the same, and then throw away this list. It does not matter, we do it on paper or in an application: together with the list we throw away knowledge. ini helps re-use shopping lists, save time and effort. Do not make the list each time. Create once and use again and again lists:  - For home and office;  - For important events;  - For cooking your favorite dishes. Single shopping list. Check the lists of everything that is not enough. The store will ini a single list of all that you need to buy. Do not specify a price. Prices are rising on a monthly basis and vary from store to store. Once driven into the application, they are "obliged" to update itself. This does not make life easier, and loads additional obligations. Therefore, there is no ini prices. Complete lists. description: Math Hexagon Puzzles is a free set of cross-figure logic puzzles (the numerical version of a crossword), using a hexagonal grid instead of the usual crossword puzzle grid. Clues are given to each puzzle and the player fills in blank spaces with numbers making sure they meet the criteria of the clues. There are 4 different sets of puzzles ranging from Easy puzzles, designed to help ease players into the process of completing the math puzzles, and finishing with Very Hard puzzles which require more time to think through and solve. The player has to achieve a certain number of puzzles before they can unlock later sets of puzzles. Each puzzle has clues, calculator, list of square numbers, list of cubed numbers and a list of prime numbers to assist the player in completion of the puzzles. The player also starts with 5 hints and receives extra ones when a level is completed to help solve the puzzles which are causing a challenge. This app follows the same concept as the Math Puzzle Challenge app, (also published by RikkiGames), except that the puzzles are more straightforward. What makes this set of puzzles more interesting is the challenge of working with a hexagonal grid instead of the usual square grid. Clues go diagonally up, diagonally down and down instead of the usual across and down. This means that a digit could be part of three different numbers. The hexagonal crossword grids lend themselves to some interesting patterns using reflective and rotational symmetry. The puzzle grids are three different sizes. The lengths of the hexagonal grids used for this set of puzzles is 2, 3 and 4 allowing for 7, 19 and 37 blank spaces or digits. There are a total of 60 puzzles with four levels of difficulty, Easy, Normal, Hard and Very Hard List of puzzle difficulties and number of puzzles: - Easy has 14 puzzles - Normal has 22 puzzles - Hard has 12 puzzles - Very Hard has 12 puzzles Math Hexagonal Puzzles can also help improve your math skills and knowledge of number properties. How do you know if a number is divisible by 2, 3, 4 or 11? What are the only digits that a square number can end with? What is the largest number whose square is less than 1000? What are the possible values that the first digit of a 4 digit number have if it is 5 times a 3 digit number? What are the only digits which a prime number can end with? As you work through the puzzles, you may start to discover the answers to these questions and other number properties, if you do not already know them.

Features: • Used by several teams in the English League • Developed with Dean Holdsworth and his many years experience as both a footballer and as a manager • Add in your player names and their preferred shirt numbers • Simply drag your players into position using your finger • Annotate your strategies using the drawing tools • Animate player movement and ball passes • Add more animation steps for more complex strategies • Save/load your strategies and make changes to them at a later date • Choose from a variety of pitches including full, half, goalmouth, training grids, blank and futsal • Add in a range of training equipment including cones, poles, manikins, hurdles, balls, ladders and zonal areas • Add notes to your strategies • The Master Tactician comes in 3 flavours: - Premium; Full Package with free updates to future addons - Pro; Standard product with option to purchase all current and future addons (mobile version available with a reduced feature set) - Free; Try out The Master Tactician with a limited feature set The Master Tactician is the ultimate soccer strategy app. It has been designed for use at all levels from grass roots to the top-flight leagues. The Master Tactician has endorsement from footballing professionals including former Premiership Striker and League 2 Manager Dean Holdsworth, former England and Manchester United Winger Lee Sharpe and West Ham Manager Sam Allardyce! Create your tactics and show your players those match winning strategies and set pieces, on the training ground or during a match. Your players will be able to see where and when to make those runs with the inbuilt animation engine. The Master Tactician benefits from continuous input and feedback from professionals in the footballing world; this gives us the edge to provide coaches with the right tool for their job. Note: this is currently only available in the English language.

description: Chifro Kids Coloring Game is fun loving game for toddlers, preschooler, kids and children to know the basic colors in real life and nature. This free application has simple and easy to use interface. Color Recognition is a three-step process: Matching, identifying, and naming colors. 'Chifro Kids Coloring Game' improves color-recognition skills through a medley of inter-activities based on these steps. The core objective of this android-based application is to improve fine motor-skills and increase visual/spatial awareness. The application is targeted towards kids falling between the age-group: 2-6 years. The application has:    •  Four inter-activities:      o  Color: To introduce basic colors of nature.      o  Quiz: To identify, conclude, and relate colors      o  Color Book: To infuse creativity with color-recognition in a tactile manner      o  Balloon Game: To infuse knowledge and fun through a game    • Scintillating interface with catchy colors and animations    • Usage of phonics through crisp and instructional audio    • Positive ambience through enlivening music    • Jaw-dropping sound effects Concept: Children are introduced to colors through multiple, interesting inter-activities. Stand-alone introduction is not a feature since evaluation is also undertaken. Learning at the grassroot-level is incorporated while keeping in mind the thought process of a child.

Burraco is a cards game for four people, distributed in 2 teams. ★ Here are 20 excellent reasons for you to download the funnier game of the category! ★ − BurracoON is 100% for free and unlimited! − It's not necessary a register to play. play fast and hassle free. − You'll never need to buy coins or chips to play with us. − Thousands of players are ALWAYS ready to play with you. − Diary, monthly and general rankings, stay at the highest spot and make fun of your friends. − Dynamic and animated screens turn it into a more fun and interactive game. − The chat is open during the game to speak out and make new friends − 30 different avatars for you, to choose the one that fits you the most. − Multiplayer game, invite your friends to your table and play online. − Play using 3G, 4G, or Wi-Fi. − Create your registration and use it also to play TrucoON − Your data will be stored online and protected by your password. You can logon from any device and access your profile. − Promotions and giveaways at our facebook fanpage − BurracoON was developed, adapted and tested on the most diversified devices and screen formats, for the purpose of guarantee the best playability and performance to all Androids devices. − Animated and illustrated interface − Application frequently updated bringing improvements suggested by players. − Developed in HTML5 ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Everything 100% free and unlimited! Download now, check it and rate it! =) ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Don't know how to play Burraco? BASICS CONVENTIONS OF BURRACO Players: 2 or 4 Numbers of cards: 108 (2 decks with 2 jokers each) Distribution: 11 cards to each player and two stockpiles with eleven cards in each one. Target: The team who makes more points wins. To make a meld: A meld is formed by 3 or more cards of the same suit, arranged in numerical sequence. The sequence goes from the 2 to the King (K). You can put the Ace (A) before the 2 or after the King. During the game you can add more cards to the meld. Buying the discard pile: To buy the discard pile, just click on the cards that are on the discard. Stockpile: A deck of 11 cards that a player receives when the cards of his hand are over. If the game is with 4 players, each stockpile corresponds to a double. Only the first player of the double, who ends with his cards, can pick up the stockpile. It’s not possible that the same double, or even the same player, to pick up two stockpiles. If the bunch’s cards reaches the end , and if there is any stockpile at the table, this one will be automatically used as bunch. Going out: To go out means when the cards of a player ends, if this player or team has already picked up the stockpile. If the stockpile hasn’t been picked by any player, the only way to go out is when both stockpiles become bunch and the cards in the player’s hand has ended. Going out directly: It’s when the player ends up with his cards without discarding any, in other words, all the cards goes to his melds. If there’s any stockpile, the player will pick it up and will continue to play without buying any card. Going out indirectly: Occurs when the players ends the cards in his hands discarding any other. If there’s a stockpile, the player will pick it up, playing only at the next round, when it’ll be his turn again. Canasta: Meld of seven cards or more of the same value or in sequence, of the same suit. There are four types of Canastas. To know the Project better enter: - www.burracoon.com - facebook.com/burracoon

The app contains Arabic mattan and translations in different languages of most accepted and authentic Hadith books including Sahih Bukhari, Sahih Muslim, Sunan Abu Dawud and Malik's Muwatta. Features • Sahih Bukhari صحيح البخاري • Sahih Muslim صحيح مسلم • Sunan Abu Dawud سنن أبي داود • Malik's Muwatta موطأ مالك • Sunan an-Nasa'i سنن النسائي • Jami` at-Tirmidhi جامع الترمذي • Sunan Ibn Majah سنن ابن ماجه • Riyad as-Salihin رياض الصالحين • Al-Adab Al-Mufrad الأدب المفرد • Shama'il Muhammadiyah الشمائل المحمدية • Bulugh al-Maram بلوغ المرام • 40 Hadith Nawawi • 40 Hadith Qudsi • Arabic Mattan added for all the books • Complete Urdu and English Translation for Sahih Al-Bukhari • Partial Urdu, English Translations for remaining books • Hadith grade (Sahih, Dhaif etct) • Adjustable font size for both Arabic and translation. • Powerful search engine (In Pro) • Unlimited Bookmarks (In Pro) • Hadith of the day based on your interest. (In Pro) • Support for both phone and tablet. • Portrait and Landscape support • Share Hadith • Easy to use
release_text: 1.7.2 Support for 2 fonts added. Choose the one displays best on your device. 1.7.1 Ibn-Majah missing book added. Share dialog updated. Bug fixes. 1.7 Grade (Sahih / Dhaif etc) added. Spelling mistakes corrected. Different color for sanad, chain of narrators and hadith text. New font to support wider range of devices. Overall improvements.

description: Now read news in Telugu on your Android device. Telugu News Hub is your single point access to all your news from major Telugu News Papers and web sites. This app also brings latest movie news and gossips from Tollywood world and has regular Telugu cinema updates for Telugu movie lovers. It has all kinds of News genres like Political, Local, National, Movies, Gossips and Movie Reviews. Telugu News Hub brings the latest news from the Telugu states of Andhra Pradesh and Telangana from the following news sources : Eenadu, Eenadu Sunday Magazine, Andhra Jyothy, Sakshi, Namasthe Telangana, AP 7 am, Telangana 7 am, V6 News, Great Andhra, Great Telangana, AP Herald, 123 Telugu, Telugu Wishesh, Namasthe Andhra, Gulte, Telugu One and Toli Velugu. Features : Click on menu button/Slide from Left to Right to open different category of news, then click on a category to view latest news Telugu News Hub brings the full article content for better readability using our mobile optimised reader. Share the articles you like on Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp, Email and by copying a link. Please provide your feedback for any improvements/suggestions. Disclaimer: Telugu News Hub App does not own the news content. This app aggregates data from the given sources and formats it to display the latest news.
release_text: Fixed few bugs and improved overall performance. Please provide your feedback for any improvements/suggestions.

description: Renotify allows you to set reminders very quickly when you're on the go. You can take your phone out, set a reminder, and put it back in your pocket as quickly as you can read this sentence. Put the app on your home screen on lock screen, and all you have to do is open it, immediately type your message and press a button, and your reminder will be waiting for you in the form of a notification next time you look at your phone. Unlike other quick notes apps, Renotify allows you to view, dismiss, or add more notes instantly from anywhere on your device via the notification tray. You will also see a reminder icon in the status bar the instant you turn the screen on. Unlike other notification apps, Renotify’s focus is on speed. No complicated options, no choosing icons, just a lightning fast process that allows you to leave yourself a reminder in literally four or five seconds. Renotify has a clean and simple UI, is free from ads, and takes up virtually no memory. Material design is used on Android 5.0 and above. Please note that Android 4.0 and below are no longer supported, although the old version of the app is still available. If you have any issues or suggestions, feel free to email me at the address below. If the translation is wrong, you can help fix it by sending me a correction! Boot permission is required to restore notifications after a reboot.
release_text: Version 2.0.5 - Fixed Portuguese translation Please note that you may need to open the app to restore your notifications if they don't restore automatically.

description: GPS Marine Charts App offers access to charts covering Malta waters (derived from MMA(Malta Maritime Authority) data). Only marine GPS app to have route assistance with Voice Prompts for marine navigation. It has route manager to create new boating routes or import existing GPX/KML routes. It supports Nautical Charts course up orientation. Please visit http://www.gpsnauticalcharts.com/main/malta/all-all-malta-charts-nautical-charts-folio.html for complete list. If you don't find the chart for Malta , please contact us at support at gpsnauticalcharts.com. * Voice Prompts for marine navigation (requires GPS ) -prompts when approaching a boating route marker -Continous distance and ETA updates -Alerts when sailing/boating off route -Alerts when boating in wrong direction *Route Editing/Creation -Create routes from scratch -Edit existing GPX/KML routes. -Add custom description to any route point. -Drop markers along route. * Offline charts derived from UKHO data. -Visually draw area to download -Textual search -Catalog (By state, region and coast guard district) -Charts reprojected for WGS84 datum *Seamless chart quilting of marine charts *Distance Bearing tool *Create custom way points - Using GPS -Select point on map -Manually enter latitude & longitude coordinates *POI layer for marine charts - Overlay POIs - POI list derived from the equivalent ENC and contains all categories including Buoy, Light, Harbour facility, Obstr. *Search POIs/Way points *Pan/Zoom/My Location * Record Marine GPS tracks * View tracks overlay * Live track animation * Track analytics/stats * Export GPX tracks. -Export to SDCard -Share GPX trakcs with friends/View on Google earth. * Auto Follow Mode (Course up) -Continuously updates boat's location on chart - Adjustable update frequency Sample Nautical Charts (please visit http://www.gpsnauticalcharts.com/ for complete list) A - Channels between Malta and Ghawdex Approaches to Malta and Ghawdex (Gozo) B Il-Bajja ta' San Pawl C- Il-Bajja tad-Dwejra D Il-Port ta' L-Imgarr E Il-Bajja Ta' Marsalforn F - Il-Bajja tax-Xlendi Ghawdex (Gozo)- Kemmuna (Comino) and the Northern Part of Malta Malta Marsaxlokk Valletta Harbours

This Android app was created to SIM unlock any Samsung smartphone model. It can be downloaded and installed for free. However the unlocking code delivery is a paid service as we are a distributor for these codes from the manufacturer database. Unlocking codes are assigned by Samsung to each specific phone on manufacturing time so each code is unique for each IMEI (world-wide unique serial of the phone). The manufacturer via the carriers and third-party professional services like ours distributes these codes. The unlocking procedure doesn't require cables, software, or any technical knowledge. Just use this app to order the code associated to your phone. Once you have the code you can unlock your phone only in a few moments. The procedure can be performed anywhere: local or abroad. There is no need to have access to a SIM of the original carrier. We offer a 100% Money Back Guarantee if the procedure doesn't work for your phone. Our app is not hacking your phone in order to unlock it. Also it is not requiring special actions (like rooting the handset) that can void your warranty. We are using only the manufacturer recommended routines for your specific model to unlock the phones with genuine codes. This is a professional service and the very same mechanics & codes are used by the carriers or any third-party certified phone service centre. THINGS TO CONSIDER BEFORE ORDERING: ★ Make sure that your phone is asking for the network unlocking code when you insert a SIM card of a different carrier. For Samsung models there is no other way to insert the code. ★ If your Samsung phone is reported as Stolen/Lost/Payment-Issues it will not work in the country of the carrier that blacklisted it. Before ordering please consult our support department. If it is your case and you still order you will NOT be eligible for a refund. Factory unlocking will not solve the carrier ban. More information about this issue you can find on our website. TROUBLESHOOTING: ★ IMEIs starting with '99' are from CDMA models. Unfortunately we are not able to help you unlock these models. There are no codes available in the database and there is no code entering procedure available. Unfortunately at this point there is no support for Samsung locked by major CDMA carriers (e.g. Verizon, Sprint). ★ Alphanumeric IMEIs? Most likely this is the MEID not the IMEI. The MEID is a serial number specific to CDMA standard. We are not able to help you unlock these models. ★ If your Samsung is rooted and/or has custom firmware installed you will need to revert to stock firmware and apply the unlocking procedure. After unlock as it is permanent you will be able to install any firmware version (custom/stock) and root the phone if you desire. ★ If you receive "Network Unlock Unsuccessful" error when you are inserting the code check the news section from our website (or contact us) for solutions. KEEP UP ON "SIM Unlock for Samsung": For tips and other helpful information visit our website http://www.imei-unlocker.com and follow us via https://twitter.com/imei_unlocker on Twitter, on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/imeiunlocker or Google+ at https://plus.google.com/+Imei-unlocker . Thanks to all our users for your support and advice! If you are having technical issues or have any questions, email us at support@imei-unlocker.com or use the help section of the application. “SIM Unlock for Samsung” application and imei-unlocker.com online service are not affiliated with or endorsed by any phone maker or carrier. All manufactures and carriers trade names/logos are for reference use only and are in no way connected to our services.

Lone Hippo is proud to add another live wallpaper, Parallax True 3D (Multi-Depth edition) to its popular depth enhancing 3D live wallpapers. Our latest one is truly 3 dimensional (hence the name). This brand new LWP has an enhanced multi-depth engine that creates an amazingly magical and immersive experience on your device. You don't need those crazy 3D goggles to enjoy this, trust me! Packed with catchy theme based wallpapers, Parallax True 3D will keep the 3D experience fresh on your phone for a long time. Choose from a variety pack of wallpapers with an easy to use settings page. Each week we will try and add new themes to this unique and engaging True 3D experience. The current pack features 6 gripping wallpapers and each of these have a character and a story to tell. ✔ USS Enterprise (for all you trekies) ✔ Fall (an amazing LWP with multi-depth falling autumn leaves) ✔ Superman vs Batman (in anticipation of the next blockbuster) ✔ Parallax Anomaly (a spoofy shark trying to bite the iOS clown fish) ✔ Zombie Crawl (for those waiting for the zombie apocalypse) ✔ **NEW** NFL (Football season is here) ✔ **NEW** Halloween Kitty Parallax True 3D is not a standalone app, but is a Live Wallpaper for your Android home screen. The realistic multiple objects and props and their 3D effect against a moving backdrop + object combo will bring alive your home page, enjoy the best of Apple's Parallax-feel with our live wallpaper right on your mobile and tablet device. As always, a lot of care has been taken to ensure optimal performance without draining your battery and avoiding unnecessary memory leaks. Some of the features include: ✔ Enhanced True 3D (multi-object + multi-depth) 3D experience on your LWP ✔ Floating props that have their own physics on the gyro/accelerometer ✔ Realistic and immersive parallax experience ✔ Ability to adjust and configure the parallax tilt effect ✔ Save battery by switching to low performance mode ✔ Easily switch X & Y axes (for devices that have them reversed) ✔ Enhance performance by switching to low image buffer mode ✔ No 3D glasses required (bah!) ✔ much more ... Changelog: v1.0.0 ✔ First release Disclaimer: Parallax True 3D LWP is not affiliated with Apple Inc.
release_text: Changelog: v1.0.3 ✔ Image optimizations ✔ Performance tweaks (snappier) ✔ Move to SD option added v1.0.2 ✔ New 3D Wallpaper: Halloween Kitty ✔ Optimizations v1.0.1 ✔ New 3D Wallpaper: NFL ✔ Minor graphic updates

description: The Official Slayer App!

Makeup Mini is an app that takes virtual makeovers to a whole new level with state-of-the-art cosmetics colors, makeup simulation, and makeover effects. You can try literally hundreds of cosmetics colors and shades in seconds! How, you ask? First, snap a photo or choose a photo from the gallery. Then, choose your favorite makeup products from our huge database. Once you have found the perfect color combination, save it to your gallery and share with your friends! You can even use it as a new display photo on your favorite social networks. The cosmetics products you have tried on will be saved for your convenience. It's like a virtual makeup artist in your pocket! Makeup Mini is designed to be fast, compact, and light so that it can be installed on a wide range of Android devices. Why not try it out today? *~*~*~*~*~*~*~* App Features *~*~*~*~*~*~*~* ✔ Try on makeup on your own photo ♥ ✔ 2,000+ of real-life cosmetics shades ✔ Built-in color blending technology ✔ Latest Facial Recognition algorithm ✔ Automatically download more cosmetic options as they become available ✔ Support popular social networks ✔ Support sharing options This app uses ModiFace's latest technology to realistically simulate shine, glitter, textures, and intensities of the cosmetics products. You can share the makeover using many apps already installed on your device. So, why not try out this app today and let us know what you think! *~*~*~*~*~*~*~* Quick FAQ *~*~*~*~*~*~*~* Q. Face point adjustment is difficult... A. Say you want to move a point. You don’t have to touch ‘on’ the point. You can simply touch the ‘near-by’ region and drag your finger to move that point. This should make it easier for you to adjust the point! Q. What do you mean by “Would you like to save this photo as private model”? A: By saving a photo as a model photo, you can access it quickly from your model library. This photo *will not* be shared with anyone else. You can remove this model as well so don’t be afraid to use this feature! Q. Where are the photos saved to? A. Saved photos can be found in ModiFace folder here: /mnt/sdcard/Pictures/ModiFace/. If you have any issues, it's best to email us directly, as we cannot respond to reviews. ✔ Support: Android 2.2 (Froyo) to Android 4.x (Ice Cream Sandwich, Jelly Bean, KitKat)

Fatty Dragon is HUNGRY! In this endless runner meets twitch platformer, Fatty is barreling nonstop across several environments looking to eat all the donuts it can find. Help it out by making sure it gets all of the regular donuts, flies through the big donuts, and doesn't fall to its death! Unlock stars that you can use to trade for power ups! Change the way you approach the levels with the options to set everything on fire, carry a Dragon Rider on your back, or avoid all the donuts in Diet Mode! Can you reach (and defeat) the terrifying final boss? Do you think it wants to eat you, or donuts, or what? What even is it?!

description: 毎日の「おいしい」を共有しよう ♪ただのカメラアプリじゃない！ 食べラは、ランキングとクチコミのグルメサイト『食べログ』が作った、無料のグルメ写真共有アプリです。料理の写真を独自のフィルタ・画像補正でより美味しそうに加工し、食べログの店舗情報と連携させて、FacebookやTwitter上の友人や他の食べラユーザーと共有できます。 ♪毎日の「おいしい」はよりおいしく！ 『目の前にある美味しそうな料理が、スマートフォンのカメラで撮影すると美味しさが伝わらない写真になってしまったことはありませんか?』 食べラは、暗い店内で撮った料理の写真でも、7種類のフィルタ・8種類のフレーム・ぼかしや明るさ調整の画像加工の機能で簡単に美味しく、魅力的で印象的な写真に加工することができます。 ♪毎日の「おいしい」は記録しよう！ 『あの時食べたアレ、美味しかったなぁ…どこのお店だっけ？』 食べラで投稿した写真はカレンダー・よく行くお店順・お気に入り順で自動で記録されていきます。 いつ、どこのお店で何を食べたか、自分の外食記録日記アルバムとして保存しておけるほか、友達の行きつけやお気に入りメニューから、知らなかったお店を発見できるのも楽しさのひとつです。レコーディングダイエットにも最適！ ♪毎日の「おいしい」はお店の情報付きで共有しよう！ 『フェイスブックやツイッターで友達が投稿したランチの写真がとても美味しそうなのに、お店の名前や場所がわからないことありませんか?』 食ベラで撮った写真は簡単にTwitterやFacebookで友達と共有できます。ただ写真を共有できるだけではなく、日本最大級のグルメサイト「食べログ」と連携して、お店の情報付きで共有することができます。 また、食べラから食べログへの写真投稿も可能です。 もちろん、お店をひもづけないでの投稿もできるので、お弁当や手作りのお料理の投稿も大歓迎！ ♪行ったお店や料理の写真でつながろう！ バージョン2.0からの新機能、SNS機能で美味しそうな写真に「食べたい！」したり、友達や気になる他の食べラユーザーを「フォロー」できるようになりました。 ランチもディナーも、ラーメン店・イタリアン・お洒落なカフェ・レストラン・定食屋・居酒屋・バー…日本全国からリアルタイムに投稿される様々なジャンルの美味しそうな料理の写真の数々は、眺めているだけでお腹が空いてきます。 撮影、加工、記録、共有をわかりやすいインターフェイスで一気にできる無料グルメアプリの定番です。 大きなカメラでの撮影は気が引けてしまうあなたも、スマートフォンと食べラで食事の思い出を記録し、共有しましょう！ ※食べログとは? 食べログは月間3,000万人以上が利用する日本最大級の口コミグルメサイトです。全国70万店以上のお店が参加ユーザーの評価をもとに点数付けされているので、リアルなユーザーの評価に基づいたお店探しが可能になるサイトです。各店舗ページではお店の詳細情報だけでなく、そのお店を実際に利用したユーザーの生の感想、投稿写真が多数掲載されており、お店選びの失敗を未然に防ぐことができます。 -- 食べラ 食ベラ たべら タベラ tabera 食べログ 食ベログ Let's share the daily "delicious" ♪ not just a camera app! description: HITS TV Love to watch TV while on the go? The HITS TV app is the answer! Catch-up on your all-time favourite shows from the HITS TV channel on-demand for free! Simply sign-in using your pay-TV provider's login and voila - you're watching shows on the HITS TV app! HITS is a brand new channel that brings you the greatest TV ever created – all in one place. Reconnect with iconic stories and characters every weekday at the same time, same place - HITS TV channel. Available in South East Asia, Hong Kong, Macau For more information, visit us at www.hitstv.com or www.facebook.com/hitstv Please let us know how you've enjoyed using the HITS TV app. Happy Viewing!

Shoot and survive or you will be dead before dawn eaten by an horrible creature in this horror yet exciting first person shooter! As a devils hunter you will adventure through dark forests and undead cemeteries to kill zombies and vampires! Beware of the powerful werewolves and blood-thirsty vampires, fight them with your arsenal of guns, machine guns and shotguns or use your special powers to cast enchantments and devastating magics! Shoot with accuracy and reload your weapon fast to keep the monsters away, try to hit the monster's head to make an head-shot or shoot at the monster's arms to blast them! Also try your best to save the poor maidens before they are turned into deadly vampires! But will you be able to reach the demon's mansion, an house of the dead where a great evil await you? ★ Features ★ - Complete all the 20 awesome game stages! - Equip up to 12 different weapons and kill all the monstrous enemies! - Make the best score and collect stars making deadly combos or by blasting the enemy's head! - Upgrade your weapons, stats and magic powers to become the ultimate gunman! - 3D graphics of the highest quality and in Full HD!!! - Collect coins to buy several items and power-ups in a well assorted virtual store! - Supports Google Play Games: compete with players all around the world thanks to leaderboards and achievements! - Supports both smartphones and tablets! For any problem with the game contact us at: support@catfishbluesgames.com --------------------------------------------------- Enjoy our LATEST games: - Rocket Racer - Brave Knight Rush - Caveman Dino Rush - Alien Apocalypse - Zombies After Me! - Deadly Moto Racing

Physics, a branch of science, is the study of forces and their impacts on the environment. Modern physics connects ideas together about the laws of symmetry and conservation (energy, momentum, charge, and parity). The word physics comes from the Greek word ἡ φύσις "nature".

Note: SecureTeen Parental Control App must be installed on your child's phone or tablet. If you have installed parental control app on your own device to test the functionality then you can uninstall it by logging into the app on the device and then clicking "Disable Protection" button. ---------------------------------------------------- Worried that your Kids might be exposed to mature content online through cell phones and tablets? Is it your teens’ location that always keeps you on your toes? Don’t worry; we have the perfect solution for you. SecureTeen brings you a complete parental control app which addresses your worries by monitoring and filtering your kids’ online activities, keeping a tab on apps they download on their cell phones & tablets and keeps you informed about their location. SecureTeen Parental Control App helps filter out all the cheesy and harmful content so your teens of impressionable age can enjoy all the good that the internet has to offer. This app lets you enhance your child’s online experience by ensuring that they stay safe from stalkers, cyberbullying, mature content, porn, and a whole host of other harmful online elements. This all encompassing tool allows parents to control apps that their teens download, stay aware of their location and remotely monitor their devices. But just what can you do with this helpful tool for parents? Here is a sneak peek:- - Set a schedule of your child's phone or tablet usage. - Keep a check on your child’s online presence 24/7 with SecureTeen’s help. - Use the bulk of built-in categories offered by SecureTeen to block all inappropriate content from your teens' internet experience. - Don’t like an app they are using? Use SecureTeen to shut it down. Even if it’s installed on the phone, it won’t work. - Use Web History Logs to stay informed when it comes to your child’s online activity. - Use SecureTeen to track their location and where they go, so you can make sure their well-being isn't compromised. - Monitor all SMS/MMS sent and received from child device - Monitor all Call details - All contacts stored on the phone/tablet are uploaded to your account and then matched with phone numbers of text messages and calls - Track all Facebook activity and get alerts for suspicious friends & posts with SecureTeen - Monitor all Instagram activity remotely from your web based dashboard - And the best part: SecureTeen lets you do it all remotely through an online control panel created especially for you so you can control your child’s safety. With SecureTeen, you can let your teen safely browse the internet with minimal supervision, but optimum care, while staying informed about their outdoor location. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Important notes for users: - SecureTeen can protect the settings screen of the device. If this setting is activated, it will require you to type your SecureTeen password to access the settings screen. - If an app or a web site is locked by SecureTeen then parents can unlock it by using their SecureTeen password. They can also allow it remotely from their web control panel by white listing the app or web site - You can remotely manage SecureTeen at any time by logging into your online dashboard at http://www.secureteen.com/login - Need help? Please call our Toll Free number 1-310-409-0451 OR visit the support page at http://support.secureteen.com/

Sie wollen mit einem Boot auf Seeschifffahrtsstraßen fahren? Dann benötigen Sie den Sportbootführerschein Binnen See. Diese Lern-App schafft mit einem sehr effektiven Lernsystem die Voraussetzungen zum bestehen von der Führerscheinprüfung. Die Lern-App beinhaltet alle Fragen für Sportbootführerschein See, die sich wie folgt zusammensetzen: ✔ Basisfragen (72 Fragen) ✔ Spezifische Fragen Segeln (47 Fragen) ✔ Spezifische Fragen See (213 Fragen) Die Fragen sind aktuell und entsprechen den original Prüfungsfragen, die ab Mai 2012 gültig sind. Der eigene Lernerfolg kann jederzeit kontrolliert werden. Dabei werden Fragen, die Sie noch nicht korrekt beantwortet haben rot markiert, Fragen die einmal bis dreimal korrekt beantwortet haben orange und Fragen die Sie mindestens viermal korrekt beantwortet haben grün angezeigt. "Grüne" Fragen werden im weiteren Verlauf des Lernmodus nicht mehr angezeigt, so dass Sie sich voll auf die Fragen konzentrieren können, die Sie noch lernen müssen. Dieses Lernsystem ist sehr effektiv und Erfahrungen zeigen, dass man sich noch sehr lange nach dem lernen erinnern kann und somit die Prüfung bestehen kann. Bestandteil dieser Lern-App sind folgende Funktionen: ✔ Alle aktuellen Fragen für den SBF See unterteilt in Kategorien ✔ Statistik, die Ihren aktuellen Lernerfolg zeigt ✔ Übersicht über offene und abgeschlossene Fragen ✔ Schnell-Lern-Modus ✔ FAQ´s mit den häufigsten Fragen zur App ✔ Internetverbindung oder andere Berechtigungen sind nicht erforderlich Die Fragen entsprechen dem aktuellen und offiziellen Fragenkatalog von www.elwis.de. You want to take a boat on tidal waters? Then you need the Sportbootführerschein inland lake. This learning app creates a very effective learning system consist of the requirements for the driving test. The learning app contains all the questions for Sportbootführerschein See who made up as follows: ✔ basic questions (72 questions) ✔ Specific questions Sailing (47 questions) ✔ Specific Questions lake (213 questions) The questions are current and meet the original exam questions that are valid from May 2012. The personal learning success can be controlled any time. It matters that you have not answered correctly are marked in red, the questions have been answered correctly once to three times orange and questions you have answered at least four times correctly displayed in green. "Green" issues are no longer displayed in the further course of the learning mode, so that you can fully concentrate on the questions that you still have to learn. This learning system is very effective and show experiences that one for a long time can be learned after the recall and therefore can pass the exam. Part of this learning app are the following functions: ✔ All current issues for the SBF lake divided into categories ✔ statistic that shows your current learning ✔ overview of open and closed questions ✔ Quick learn mode ✔ FAQ's with the most common questions about the app ✔ Internet connection or other permissions are not required The questions correspond to the current and official catalog of questions www.elwis.de.

description: MyCarTracks is revolutionary way for tracking your vehicle, fleet or your employees/workforce and their trips. More and more vehicle owners, business owners, fleet managers and companies are discovering this new way how to efficiently track and manage their resources. Track your Cars, Trucks, Motorcycles, Boats or Heavy Construction Vehicles - fits for any type and size of fleet. ♥ More than 150 000 app downloads and thousands daily active users that loves our service. Take a tour and learn more on http://www.mycartracks.com ♥ The ONLY app that has intelligent revolutionary battery friendly AUTO start recording feature. Start it and you can "minimize and forget about the app", it automatically records every track throughout the day. How? The app recognizes that you're moving and records tracks throughout the day. This feature has advanced movement detection that helps saving battery. Optionally you can let the app to start recording when connected on charger, bluetooth headset, (NFC and Tasker in development). ★ MyCarTracks is breaking traditional approach on vehicle/fleet tracking by removing the need to install GPS unit (blackbox, mileage logger) to your vehicles. As replacement it uses your android device (phone/tablet) that you or your employees are carrying every time driving a vehicle or working outside the office. It's so easy, just install an app and the phone is turned into GPS tracking unit with much more advantages than old in-car GPS units. ★ MyCarTracks GPS mileage tracker sends data to www.mycartracks.com where they are securely saved on the cloud. You can track your personal vehicle position and routes or fleet location on a map and generate stunning reports that can be used for optimizing your time and costs or tax purposes. ★ With MyCarTracks you can record tracks and visualize your tracks on world map while watching live performance statistics. Control route, distance (km or miles), drive times, stop times and much more. FLEET MANAGEMENT You can share your cars and tracks with other people, who can watch your actual position in real time. ♥ How to create fleet Create vehicles on your master account share them among phones or tablets of your employees. On all devices, that you shared cars with, go to Menu > Cars and press Synchronize all button. Now they can use these vehicles and you have great overview, stats and reports of your whole workforce. Learn how to create fleet here http://www.mycartracks.com/learn-how-to-create-a-fleet PRICING You can use MyCarTracks for free for ever. Use all features our app offers, track and store recorded tracks on your phone or PC, export reports or view them on other software (like Google Earth). You can also store them in our Web Management Application for 2 weeks where you can view actual position or tracks directly on map, view stats and export reports for free. Advanced features and longer data storage (even for lifetime) starting from only 0.93 USD (0.67 EUR) per vehicle! Pricing plans http://www.mycartracks.com/pricing NEWS AND SOCIAL ★ Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/mycartracks ★ Twitter: http://twitter.com/#!/MyCarTracks ★ Google+: https://plus.google.com/+Mycartracks/ ★ LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/slash-idea We are currently working on Workforce management, Job planning and dispatching, POI, Geofence & alerts

description: Chess is a two-player strategy board game played on a chessboard, a checkered gameboard with 64 squares arranged in an eight-by-eight grid. It is one of the world's most popular games, played by millions of people worldwide in homes, parks, clubs, online, by correspondence, and in tournaments. Each player begins the game with 16 pieces: one king, one queen, two rooks, two knights, two bishops, and eight pawns. Each of the six piece types moves differently. Pieces are used to attack and capture the opponent's pieces, with the objective to 'checkmate' the opponent's king by placing it under an inescapable threat of capture. In addition to checkmate, the game can be won by the voluntary resignation of the opponent, which typically occurs when too much material is lost, or if checkmate appears unavoidable. A game may also result in a draw in several ways, where neither player wins. The course of the game is divided into three phases: opening, middlegame, and endgame. This is a simple yet intelligent chess game which you will definitely like to play. It's simple in look-and-feel and does not support multiplayer mode in the free version. I am shortly going to publish the premium application which will be equipped with multiplayer mode; and can be played on two different devices over Bluetooth and Wi-Fi direct and Internet. Till then, why don't you try and enjoy your triumph over your Phone?

Mage Manager is an effective and handy app for Magento store owners. It transfers information about customers, orders, best sellers and most viewed items on your tablet or smartphone in several clicks. The data can be displayed as charts and tables which is convenient for quick overview. The app gives an opportunity to receive data over a certain period of time and track progress in sales. Features: + Additional methods + Additional JSON-RPC protocol + Ability to debug calls + Intuitive interface + User-friendly interface + Easy 2-minutes installation + Free support + Meets Magento programming practices for most versions and customizations compatibility Mage Manager is connected to your store via the free API Bridge Magento extension. This module uses the extended Magento API methods and additional JSON-RPC protocol. Before starting to work with Mage Manager, you should install API Bridge and create your User Name and API Key. You can download free API Bridge here: http://www.magpleasure.com/api-bridge.html

description: 웹서핑을 하다가 메모가 필요하신 경우가 있으시죠? 이런 경우 홈 키를 눌러 메모 어플을 찾아 헤메시죠? 이메일을 확인하다가 계산이 필요하신경우도 있으시죠? 이 역시 계산기 어플을 찾아야 합니다. 물론 "앱 스위치"가 있다고 하여 찾지 않고 실행이 되지는 않습니다. 하지만!! 자주 사용하는 어플들을 홈 화면에 배치해 두는것도 한 두개죠.. 또 사용할때마다 홈키를 눌러 찾아야 하는 번거로움이 있으시죠. Are you trying to rally up some band members to form a new band or are you new in town and trying to find people to jam with? Post your musician profile and instantly get access to other local musicians, no matter where you are. • Explore profiles of other musicians • Create your musician profile and highlight your skills, instruments, influences and interests • Invite and connect with other musicians and share personal information • In-App messaging to chat directly, privately and secure • Post text, photos, YouTube videos and SoundCloud tracks • Comment, like and share posts • Facebook and Twitter integration

description: The Certified Veterinary Assistant app is a study guide that helps prepare you for a position as a veterinary assistant, technician, and animal care giver. Includes fourteen learning modules with more than 1250 multiple choice quiz questions and flashcards. Each learning module also includes a glossary with common terms and definitions. Learning Modules: Module 1: Animal Medical Terminology Module 2: Office Procedures Module 3: Medical Abbreviations Module 4: Anatomy Module 5: Physiology Module 6: Small Animal Breeds Module 7: Large Animal Breeds Module 8: Animal Nursing Module 9: Avian & Exotic Medicine Module 10: Animal Medicine & Diseases Module 11: Lab Procedures Module 12: Emergency Medicine Module 13: Animal Medical Spanish Terms Module 14: My Custom Learning Plus: - Create your own flashcards, multiple-choice and glossary - Send multiple-choice quiz questions to friends - Post score for global ranking - Keep up to date with latest news and articles with the Veterinary news feed. - Now with 100’s of images. This study guide app is for people who need to develop foundation knowledge of veterinary medicine and veterinary technology; animal sciences and typical behavior characteristics of animal species; role in patient history, physical exam, and client educations. It covers veterinary terminology; animal anatomy; physiology; office business operations; and veterinary emergency care. The Veterinary Assistant & Technician Guide app also addresses pathology; radiation and x-ray production, equipment operation and care; positioning the animal for radiography production; use of drugs in veterinary medicine; introduction to drug testing methodology and the use/handling of prescriptions; calculation of dosages and administration techniques; drug actions, interactions, and adverse reactions; animal disease diagnosis, treatment, and prevention, principles and practices of surgical nursing; pharmacology of commonly used anesthetic agents, and anesthetic emergencies.

Discover Gizmo's Food Revolution, an adventure game that will put your skills to the test. The fries are done and the burgers are hot .. that can only mean one thing .. it's time for the food revolution! Join Gizmo the hungry dinosaur food on his epic quest in this fun addicting game. Gizmo is a little different from your average dinosaur .. he doesn't like to hunt his food but prefers a good old fashion meal. The path to a healthy meal is not an easy one because Gizmo will have to pass through many obstacles and enemies to reach his goal. He is-determined to reach the top or starve trying! Don't forget a healthy diet features a lot of fruits so be sure that Gizmo collects the apples and the other healthy fruits, they will give him the extra boost he needs. If you are a dinosaur loving, food enthusiast and love adventure you will feel just right helping out Gizmo. With your help he will be enjoying his meal soon and the food revolution will come to an end.

Stopwatch, designed specifically for bodybuilders and anyone who trains the body. Count the time between sets in the exercise/session by pressing the start button. Have completed set, just press the same button again to restart the stopwatch. No need to reset the stopwatch to restart it. Beep indicates that one minute passed. Depending on the load, the time between sets should range from 1.5 to 2.5 minutes. Nothing extra! It is as simple as snow and the most convenient stopwatch.

description: We have a huge emergency. A house is on fire and we have to go to extinguish the fire, but we have a problem. Our diverse car is very dirty and we can not leave it, therefore we go with this car fire in a laundry while the other I will go to extinguish the fire truck. We arrived at the laundry and saw that there is no one at all, so we put in front and waited for the workers to come to wash our car. I saw that the workers did not come so we decided to wash the car ourselves. We need your help in the first place to wash your car with a jet of water, then you have to clean the wheels very well because they are very dirty. You need to apply foam on the car body to be washed more easily. You need to put the car between rotating brushes and wash it to remove dirt and then have to wait until the car body dry. After the body is dry, you should apply a coat of wax to shine and have a nice color. Thanks for your efforts and for your help. Lastly the car is clean and we can put out the fire with it. Mobile Mouse instantly transforms your Android device into an in air, wireless remote for your computer! Sit back and use this remote to surf the web, browse your photo library or control your music player from the comfort of your couch. Mobile Mouse uses the built in accelerometer to translate your hand motions into mouse movements on your screen. It can also operate as a trackpad remote, allowing you to control your computer with a single finger. Mobile Mouse is an essential part of any home theater PC and a presenter's best friend. Mobile Mouse uses an innovative application notification system to let the app know what program you are running at any time and show the appropriate keys for that program. This allows Mobile Mouse to provide a single screen remote for controlling ALL your media and web applications. Mobile Mouse is the only app to feature a full fledged dock, just like you'd find on your Mac! Mobile Mouse supports all the most popular web and media programs for the Mac and PC. New remote definitions are automatically downloaded daily to your computer, so you will always have the newest remotes as we create them. ** Does not work on Tablet devices yet, we are working on a tablet version ** Features: - Accelerometer based mouse controller - Trackpad(full screen vertical and landscape modes) - Application switcher (works just like the dock in OS X) - Ability to hide keyboard (shake to hide/show) - Landscape keyboard (shake in landscape mode to show) - Media Remote (w/vol up/down and eject buttons) - Web Remote - Numeric keyboard - Application notifications - Remote keyboard with function and arrow keys - Programmable hotkeys (can be set to run a program or keyboard combination) - Scroll pad - Left and Right mouse buttons - Modifier Keys - On screen typing - Sleep/Wake your computer - Password protection - Custom sensitivity settings - Foreign language keyboards - Supports Bonjour or static IP - No screen size limitation. Works with multiple monitors. - And much, much more. View our demo video and website to see all that Mobile Mouse can do for you. Provides remote control capabilities for programs like iTunes, VLC, Front Row, Windows Media Center, WinAmp, Firefox, Safari, boxee, PowerPoint, Keynote, and much more!

Calling all treasure hunters! After an epic sea battle, the entire pirate fleet has sunk in an unexplored region of the ocean. Now, a fortune in undersea treasure awaits anyone daring enough to go in after it. Arm yourself with nothing but your trusty harpoon gun, or go all out with your own personal sea jet-- it’s your choice. Although the undersea world is beautiful and exotic, this expedition is no pleasure cruise. You’ll have to fend off monstrous giant squid and electric jellyfish as they greedily guard the gold, silver, and bronze coins scattered beneath the briny blue. And stay on the lookout for biggest baddie of the marine world—the Killer Shark! Get out of his way fast… or turn him into shark fin soup! If you survive, you’ll gain riches beyond your wildest dreams! Will you brave the dangers of the deep? Features: -Earn coins to purchase advanced gear, from sea cruisers to submarines -Harpoon or torpedo enemies with cool firing graphics and sounds -Swim, fight, and explore to an addictive safari rhythm -Enjoy innovative and addictive gameplay: touch the left side of the screen to go up and the right side to shoot
